Question: In My Story, this person recalls her mother "screaming and laughing" as she was forcibly removed to the State Hospital in Norwalk.
Hints: By this time, this person had only completed one film, Bus Stop, under her four-picture contract with 20th Century Fox.
The press speculated about the identity of the anonymous model and commented that she closely resembled this person.
This person returned to the set of Something's Got to Give and filmed a sequence in which she appeared nude in a swimming pool.
